title: Does a K-pop band have over 20 members? - Quora

response.answer_text: NCT has over 20 members. Not all of them come from South Korea, though! They have a global technology concept and 4 subunits: NCT 127, NCT Dream, NCT U, and a Chinese group called WayV. What I like is that they make songs in other languages! (Korean, Mandarin Chinese, English, and Japanese) Here are the members(based on country) Korea🇰🇷 Moon Taeil 문태일 -born 14 June 1994 in SeoulLee Taeyong 이태용-born 1 July 1995 in SeoulKim Dongyoung (Doyoung) 김동영 (도영)-born 1 February 1996 in Guri, GyeonggiKim Jungwoo 김정우-born 19 February 1998 in Sanbon-dong, GunpoLee Jeno 이제노-born 23 April 2000 in IncheonLee Donghyuck (Haechan) 이동혁 (해찬)-born 6 June 2000 in Seoul, but lived in Jeju for 6 yearsNa Jaemin 나재민-born 13 August 2000 in Jeonju, but grew up in SeoulJeong Sungchan 정성찬-born 13 September 2001 in SeoulPark Jisung 박지성-born 5 February 2002 in SeoulChina 🇨🇳 Qian Kun “Kun” 钱锟-born 1 January 1996 in Taining County, Fujian)Dong Sicheng “Winwin”董思成-born 28 October 1997 in Wenzhou, ZhejiangXiao Dejun “Xiaojun” 肖德俊-born 8 August 1999 in GuangdongHuang Renjun 黄仁俊(born 23 March 2000 in Jilin)Zhong Chenle 钟辰乐 (born 22 November 2001 in Shanghai)Japan🇯🇵 Nakamoto Yuta 中本悠太 (born 26 October 1995 in Kadoma, Osaka prefecture)Ōzaki Shotaro 大崎将太郎(born 25 November 2000 in Kanagawa prefecture)US🇺🇸 Johnny Suh (Seo Young-ho) 서영호 (쟈니) (born 9 February 1995 in Chicago, Illinois)Canada🇨🇦 Mark Lee (Lee Min-hyung) 이민형 (마크)-born 2 August 1999 in Toronto but moved to Vancouver at a young age. However, he has attended school in the US (New York)Thailand🇹🇭 Chittaporn Leechaiyapornkul “Ten” ชิตพล ลี้ชัยพรกุล (born 27 February 1996 in Bangkok)Hong Kong🇭🇰 Wong Yukhei (Cantonese)/Huang Xuxi (Mandarin) 黃旭熙 “Lucas” -born 25 January 1999Macau🇲🇴 Wong Kunhang 黄冠亨 (Cantonese)/Huang Guanheng (Mandarin) “Hendery”-born 28 September 1999)Other (multiple countries) Jeong Yoon-oh 정윤오 (재현) “Jaehyun” (born 14 February 1997 in Seoul, but has lived in the US (Connecticut) for 4 years.)🇰🇷🇺🇸Liu Yangyang 刘扬扬 (born 10 October 2000 in Taiwan, but has lived in Düsseldorf, Germany)🇹🇼🇩🇪

there are no official "bands" with over 20 people, but there is an artist, NCT, that has 23 members and counting, the people under NCT in their own subunits as well. the reason they have so many is because their group concept is to be able to add and incorporate as many members as they want into the group and their music.
